```{r setup}
library(helphlme)
library(SLAM)
library(dplyr)
```


## Create Data to Test hlme
```{r}
main <- data_SLAM_gluc %>%
  left_join(data_SLAM_census, by = "idno") %>%
  select(-c(lact, cage, eartag, name, X, taghistory, tag, animal_id)) %>%
  mutate(age_wk = difftime(date, dob, units = "weeks")) %>%
  filter(cohort %in% c("1","2","3","4","5"))
```

## Test hlme2
```{r}

betas <- hlme(fixed = gluc~age_wk, random = ~1, subject = "idno", ng = 1, data = main)
mo <- helphlme::hlme2(fixed = gluc~age_wk, 
                        mixture = ~age_wk,
                        random = ~1,
                        subject = "idno",
                        classmb = ~1,
                        ng = 2,
                        idiag = TRUE,
                        nwg = TRUE,
                        B = betas,
                        data = main)


```
